itemDisplayName: Provision a SQL Database with Auto scaling function
description: This ARM Template deploys an Azure SQL Database with DTU Consumption plan (with a new Azure SQL Server) including all the resources required to perform Auto Scaling (scale up and scale down) based on Metric Alerts using a function app.
summary: Azure SQL Database with DTU Consumption plan (with a new Azure SQL Server) including all the resources required to perform Auto Scaling.
